pry.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to try to find out details about someone else’s private life in an impolite way
pry.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: I don’t want to pry, but I need to ask you one or two questions.
reporters prying into the affairs of celebrities
pry.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to force something open, or force it away from something else
pry.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: We finally managed to pry the door open with a screwdriver.
